HEY TO ALL OF YOU PEOPLE

HEY WHATS UP MY NAME IS LAURA AND I AM 24 YEARS OLD AND I AM WRITING TO EVERY ONE TO SAY THAT IF U ARE LONELY AND NEED A FRIEND WELL THEN HERE I AM

One of the poems that i got published

Â© Laura M. Doggett

Coldness Of the Night

When I close my eyes at night and all of my senses fade. I hear your voice whispering my name, and I know in my heart that I will never be the same. It's your pressence at night in my dreams that makes me want to scream. It's your essence that makes it hard for me to wake. Do you even care that it is my heart at stake. I long to touch you, to feel your breath whisper on my skin again and again. Oh why can't this be real! All of these things that I feel. When will be over you? This I ask myself as I am trapped in this nightly hell. Will in here I forever dwell? This cold dark place with you as its face. When will feel the warmth of the light, Instead of the cold of the night. Never. As long as you dwell in my heart

The athiest and the bear

There was an atheist out bear hunting one day, and he came across a big bear. Just as he went to shoot the bear looked at him, well he took the shot and his gun jammed. Well the bear came charging up to him. The athiest started to pray he said "Lord I know that I have not ever prayed to you before, heck I never even belived in you, please let this bear be a Christian bear. Amen" Well the next thing that he knew the bear got down on his knees and said "Thank you lord for this meal that I am about to recieve."

In Loving Memory

One minute you were here and the next you were gone.
Your absence has left us here feeling all alone.
It is like a piece ot our hearts is missing.
You took the pieces with you on your journey home.
We showed you how much that we care.
You were always there.
You always came to me when I cried.
It will never be the same, now that you are gone.
A vital piece is gone from this home.
As I sit here and think of you, I start to cry.
I am writing you this to tell you goodbye.

Jessie You were my best friend we will miss you esecially mom. We love you very much You were our angel dog there will never be another that was like you

If you would like to see a picture go to my pictures. This was a one in a million dog she was very dear to us and she will be sorelyh missed, by all of us and the other animals that are here. She was very in tune to us and always came runnin at the first sign of tears. She would give hugs. When u went outside she would find a ball and follow you around the yard with it until you stopped to play with her

You Know What

You know what I hate is guys that get on here and send me screwed up messages tellin me that my fat self makes them sick, well if that is the case don't look at them . Beauty is not just on the outside, it is really what is on the inside that counts. I am perfectly happy with the way that I am. God made me this way. You can not judge a book by the cover. If you do not like big girls or big people then that goes to show you just how shallow of a person that you are. I am steppin up for us big girls, we can do the same things that little people can so do not judge us. That is the way that I feel about it.

YAY

Hello every one. I found out that I am going to be an Aunt, You see it means the world to me because I cannot have kids, so my brother's baby means the world for me., I cant wait for it to get here, It is due november 21, 2007

The Angel

An angel came to see me today.
She told me to tell her all the things I needed to say.
So I told her all my fears.
She say with me,
Held my hand,
And wiped my tears.
She said that I've been needing this for years.
I'll never forget the beauty in her face,
Or the serenity of the place.
She told of things yet to come.
Things that have passed.
As I sat there it felt like I was looking through a glass.
It was over before I knew it.
And as she began to stand.
She took my hand and kissed it.
Telling me to understand.
That life was never easy.
Sometimes we had to take a stand.
But we are never alone,
God always lends a helping hand.

My Sorrow

My heart is breaking.
I can feel it breaking.
I taste my tears.
I cant control my fears.
My cries wasted.
My sobs go unheard.
I can't say a word.

My World

All the lies you told play in my head.
Sometimes it makes me feel dead.
I live in a lonely world.
A dark void.
All my tears tasted.
My dark lonely dark world.
If only there was light.
Instead of the deep dark night.
I just sit here tasting my fear.

Unlove Me

Unlove me.
Set my soul free.
This love is killing me.
What do you care.
You were never there.
Always gone.
Leaving me alone.
Now we're through.
And I sit here loving you.
Leave me be.
This love is killing me.
I'm missing you.
While she's kissing you.
I'm coming undone.
Piece by piece.
Thread by thread.
Bit by bit.
Why can't you quit.
It makes me sad.
Do you feel bad?
Set me free.
Unlove me.
Before this love kills me.

Broken Heart

Oh god is this real?
All of this I feel?
I should have known your feelings were fake.
And that it was my heart that would break.
Now I have to pick up the pieces of my heart.
I really don't know where to begin,
Or where to start.
Oh God I wish that this would end,
The crying of my broken heart

You

I can't get you out of my head.
Sometimes I wish your memory was dead/
How can this be?
It's like I am blind and I can;t see.
It hurts with every breath that I take.
Sometimes I think that my sanities at stake.
God help my thoughts,
All this you brought.

Cry

I cry in the night.
It's not from fright.
It's thoughts of you that make me cry.
All I ask is,
Why am I hurting,
and you are not.
All that I fought to keep is gone,
And I weep here alone.

Once Again

Once again my dreams are shattered.
Once again my heart is battered.
Once again I wished that I could die.
Once again I pick up the pieces to begin anew.
Once again I am through with you.

Shadows In My Dreams

The shaows in my dreams they come, creeping in with their silent whisperings.

They tell me of your face,

They take me to another place.

One of pain.

One with no gain.

Help me I scream over and over again.

They whisper there tauntings to me,

Laughing at me the whole time.

The more I scream, the more I weep.

The harder it is for me to wake.

Why won't you leave me alone,

take your demons and go home.

Find someone else, you are going to kill me.

But that is your will is it not.

Another soul bought,

and another lesson taught.

I loved you,

You hated me.

You and your evil waited to break me.

When you did,

All I could do was cry,

And hope that I would die.

Oh but that was not to be,

You had to have all of me.........
